name: notion_query_database
description: Query a Notion database to retrieve pages (rows) with optional filtering. Returns pages with their property values. Use notion_get_database_schema first to understand available properties. For complex filters, use Notion's filter format (see Notion API docs).

database_id.description: The Notion database ID (32-character hex string or UUID format)

filter_conditions.description: Optional filter object in Notion API format. Example: {"property": "Status", "select": {"equals": "Done"}}. Omit to return all pages.

limit.description: Maximum number of pages to return (default: 20, max: 100)
